span.b: Gateway School Closed Monday, March 16 - Monday, May 4

img.alt: Photo of Gateway Regional Middle School
Photo of Gateway Regional High School

div.a: Breaking News: Week 5 of COVID-19 Closure

span.p: As the situation and information changes, visit this dedicated page on the GRSD website for updates. Check out our latest Weekly Summary here.

div.p: All schools and offices in the Gateway Regional School District will be closed April 20–24 for April Vacation. Gateway offices will be closed as well. There will be no meal pickup available.
Staff & students return to remote enrichment learning Monday, April 27.

div.div: Gateway Regional School District does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, gender, sexual orientation, religion, homelessness, gender identity or disability. Kurt Garivaltis Director of Pupil Services, 12 Littleville Road, Huntington, MA 01050, 413.685.1017
